rooms.prompt: Where would you like to go?
What would you like to do?

exits.name: Headbutt Wall
exits.message: Ouch!

rooms.description: You wake up feeling groggy. You find you are laying atop an unfamiliar bed in an unfamiliar room. From where you lay you see a desk, a rug and a menacing machine with blinking lights.

exits.name: Look in desk
exits.message: You squint your eyes as hard as you can, but your x-ray vision spontaneously fails to start working again. Maybe you should get out of bed first.

exits.name: Look under rug
exits.message: You strain your incipient esp but the rug just won't move. Maybe you should get out of bed first.

exits.name: Look at device
exits.message: It sure is menacing. Maybe if you get out bed you can get a better look at it.

exits.name: Get out of bed
exits.message: You're a little wobbly, but you manage to stand. Just...

rooms.description: From where you stand, that machine looks even more menacing, like maybe it's thinking dark thoughts. The desk and rug look less worrying.

exits.name: Look in desk
exits.message: You open the drawer and see a pair of wire cutters. Thinking they may be useful, you steal...er, borrow them

exits.name: Look under rug
exits.message: You're vaguely dissapointed to see only a small burrow of dust bunnies, which you carefully cover back up.

exits.name: Look at device
exits.message: Well, the fact that it's a bomb explains the menacing air pretty well.

rooms.description: From where you stand, that machine looks even more menacing, like maybe it's thinking dark thoughts. The desk and rug look less worrying. The wire cutters dig into your hip a little.

exits.name: Look in desk
exits.message: You open the drawer wishing there was something more useful to find

exits.name: Look under rug
exits.message: You're vaguely dissapointed to see only a small burrow of dust bunnies, which you carefully cover back up.

exits.name: Look at device
exits.message: Well, the fact that it's a bomb explains the menacing air pretty well.

rooms.description: You stand as far away from the bomb as you can, but even from here you can see three wires. One red, one blue and one polka-dotted. The desk and the rug don't garner much attention at this point.

exits.name: Look in desk
exits.message: You open the drawer and see a pair of wire cutters. Thinking they may be useful, you steal...er, borrow them

exits.name: Look under rug
exits.message: You're vaguely dissapointed to see only a small burrow of dust bunnies, which you carefully cover back up.

exits.name: Look at bomb
exits.message: No matter how many times you try the bomb refuses to be anything else.

exits.name: Cut red wire
exits.message: Not having anything to cut the wire with, you grab it and bite through the wire. Being electrocuted means you no longer have to worry about the bomb going off.

exits.name: Cut blue wire
exits.message: Not having anything to cut the wire with, you grab it and bite through the wire. Being electrocuted means you no longer have to worry about the bomb going off.

exits.name: Cut polka-dotted wire
exits.message: Not having anything to cut the wire with, you grab it and bite through the wire. Being electrocuted means you no longer have to worry about the bomb going off.

rooms.description:
You stand as far away from the bomb as you can, but even from here you can see three wires. One red, one blue and one polka-dotted. The desk and the rug don't garner much attention at this point. 

Hmmmm, wire cutters and a bomb with three wires. I feel like I've seen this movie before.

exits.name: Look in desk
exits.message: You open the drawer wishing there was something more useful to find

exits.name: Look under rug
exits.message: You're vaguely dissapointed to see only a small burrow of dust bunnies, which you carefully cover back up.

exits.name: Look at bomb
exits.message: No matter how many times you try the bomb refuses to be anything else.

exits.name: Cut red wire
exits.message: Suddenly the bomb starts beeping alarmingly. Then it starts beeping frighteningly. Then it stops...which is worse. Finally, with a sad pop, it opens up to display a sign: 'Just Kidding!'

exits.name: Cut blue wire
exits.message: Suddenly the bomb starts beeping alarmingly. Then it starts beeping frighteningly. Then it stops...which is worse. Finally, with a sad pop, it opens up to display a sign: 'Just Kidding!'

exits.name: Cut polka-dotted wire
exits.message: Suddenly the bomb starts beeping alarmingly. Then it starts beeping frighteningly. Then it stops...which is worse. Finally, with a sad pop, it opens up to display a sign: 'Just Kidding!'

rooms.description: Congratulations! You won! Don't spend all your newly earned notoriety in one place!

exits.name: Look in desk
exits.message: Did you expect something to magically appear? You won, go home.

exits.name: Look under rug
exits.message: Amazing! You have never seen anything like it before! Except all the other times you looked under the rug at the dust bunnies.

exits.name: Look at bomb
exits.message: Man, when you find the joker that did this...
